meta.reasoning: Successfully created unified subscription model combining Stripe, RevenueCat, and Polar. The implementation includes comprehensive queries for checking subscription status and feature access, mutations for syncing from any source, and updates to existing webhook handlers to integrate with the unified system. Schema was updated to support unified tracking fields. The code is well-documented and follows the existing patterns in the codebase.
meta.task_summary: Successfully created unified subscription model combining Stripe, RevenueCat, and Polar. The implementation includes comprehensive queries for checking subscription status and feature access, mutations for syncing from any source, and updates to existing webhook handlers to integrate with the unified system. Schema was updated to support unified tracking fields. The code is well-documented and follows the existing patterns in the codebase.
